name: One Punch Fella
description:
This game was a submission for the 'So Bad it's Good' Jam 2021 and also my first game ever made.

I want to mention that  this game is hard. You are able to one punch enemies(most of them), but you are also one touch away from dying. There are no checkpoints, so if you die , you will start over. The game is about your golden button from your pants, which has been stolen. You have to fight for your glory ( and your button, of course).

Controls

WASD - Movement

LMB- Punch

ESC-Pause Menu
